recipe_name: Spiced cauliflower, onion, potato and coriander curry
author: Lesley Waters
method: Heat the oil in a pan and gently fry the onion for 2-3 minutes, or until softened, then stir in the cauliflower, potato, turmeric and chilli flakes and cook for 1-2 minutes.  Add the salt, to taste, peas, and cream and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender. To serve, spoon the curry into serving bowls and garnish with the fresh coriander.
ingredients: 2 tbsp vegetable oil,  ½ onion, finely chopped,  1 baby cauliflower, outer leaves removed, chopped,  ½ potato, peeled and chopped,  ½ tsp ground turmeric,  1 pinch chilli flakes,  salt, to taste,  25g/1oz fresh peas, out of their pods,  3 tbsp double cream,  2 tbsp chopped fresh coriander
